title: Nedschroef Fralautern GmbH is now ISO 50001 certified (Koninklijke Nedschroef Holding BV)
text: ( Source : Koninklijke Nedschroef Holding BV) For many years we have established an Environmental Management System according to standard DIN EN ISO 14001 . Nevertheless , we applied for the certificate of energy management and were delighted
